import ember from 'ember' import ajax from 'totem/ajax' export default ember.Mixin.create query_record: (model_name, query, options={}) -> key = @get_query_cache_key(model_name, query, options) if @can_get_from_cache(key, options) resolve @get_from_cache(key) else @store.queryRecord(model_name, query).then (records) => @set_cache(key, records) resolve(records) , (error) => @warn("Error in 'query_record' when querying for [#{model_name}] with: ", query, options) reject(error) query: (model_name, query, options={}) -> new ember.RSVP.Promise (resolve, reject) =>

Extract relevant keys, then remove from payload so they are not sent.

action = query.action or '' verb = query.verb or 'GET' id = query.id or null delete query.action delete query.verb delete query.id ajax_options = model: model_name data: query action: action verb: verb id: id

If a payload model_name is specified, extract that as the records to return.

model_name = options.payload_model_name if ember.isPresent(options.payload_model_name) ajax.object(ajax_options).then (payload) => if ember.isPresent(payload.links) array = @get_paginated_array(model_name, payload) resolve(array) else options.skip_ns = true if options.multimodel_name hash = {} for key, value of payload json = {} json[key] = value model_name = ember.Inflector.inflector.singularize(key) hash[key] = ajax.normalize_and_push_payload(model_name, json, options) resolve(hash) else records = ajax.normalize_and_push_payload(model_name, payload, options) resolve(records) , (error) => @warn "ajax.object failed for query of: ", query reject(error) , (error) => @warn "Could not process query of: ", query reject(error)
